== General documents and compilation issues ==
  * *Project team*
    * *Andrew "Stinger" Abramov*. Technical issues and project's maintaining. Main developer and project's architect.
    * *Alex Yudin* Strategic issues and planning. Project's architect and developer.

  * *Used libraries list*
    * [http://www.boost.org/ boost library]. The version 1.37 or greater of the boost is used in this project. The used subsystems list:
        * [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_38_0/doc/html/date_time.html Boost.Date_Time]
        * [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_38_0/libs/filesystem/doc/index.htm Boost.Filesystem]
        * [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_38_0/doc/html/program_options.html Boost.Program_options]
        * [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_38_0/libs/regex/doc/html/index.html Boost.Regex]
        * [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_38_0/libs/serialization/doc/index.html Boost.Serialization]
        * [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_38_0/libs/system/doc/index.html Boost.System]
        * [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_38_0/doc/html/thread.html Boost.Thread]
    * [http://curl.haxx.se/libcurl/ cURL library]. Web operations are performed through the cURL library.
    * [http://code.google.com/p/dtl-cpp/ dtl - Diff Template Library]. Copyright Â© 2008-2009 Tatsuhiko Kubo <cubicdaiya@gmail.com>. This code adopted into webEngine structure.
    * [http://code.google.com/p/v8/ Coogle V8 JavaScript Engine] used for custom scripts (checks end other) and scripts analizing on scanning target
    * [http://logging.apache.org/log4cxx/index.html log4cxx library] used for logging operations.
    * [http://www.doxygen.org Doxygen system] is used for documenting this project.
